typical_assumptions: Parent-child: Domain collection objects (explicit collection class encapsulates collection-level operations)
Object instantiation: Constructor injection (dependencies explicit and immutable at creation)
Integration: Direct in-process calls (module based, synchronous, simple)
UI interaction: Direct domain binding (simple forms, domain matches UI)
Error handling: Throw domain exceptions (exceptional conditions with meaningful domain error types)
Concurrency: Optimistic locking (assume conflicts rare, check version at save)
_note: These are the simplest starting points. Consult decision_criteria files when complexity requires different approaches.
